options: ['Enjoy your school', 'Sing and dance', 'Play music after school', 'Enjoy music']
questions: Which is the best title of the poem?
article:
What is your favourite tune?
Is it from that funny cartoon  ?
Songs are fun to listen and dance,
Shake and jump when you get a _ .
Play your music right after school,
It is not about trying to be cool.
When a super fun song enters your ear,
You will get so excited, suddenly you will cheer.
Go and pick songs that you like best.
Enjoy your music, with smiles and zest.
